players

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • players.Player
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Racer

    public abstract class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class player , Parent of all the other classes that play the game
    Author:
    d_carrer

        This method moves the player to the next position.

      • moveToWithoutEnergyLoss

        public void moveToWithoutEnergyLoss(int pos)
        This method is used when the player has already landed in a special position. It allows the player to move without draining energy according to the game specifications
        Parameters:
        pos - number of steps(cells) player is going to advance

      • resetPlayers

        public static void resetPlayers()
        This method resets the amount of players to 0.

      • pickCardFortune

        public java.lang.String pickCardFortune(Deck_of_Fortune deck)
        This method sets the position of the player based on the card's value he or she picked.
        Parameters:
        p - player that picks a card from a deck
        deck - used by the the player p
        Returns:
        string containing the output of the movements

      • spinWheelFortune

        public java.lang.String spinWheelFortune(Wheel_of_Fortune wheel)
        This method sets the position of the player based on value obtained by the wheel of fortune
        Parameters:
        p - An object of class player
        wheel - A Wheel_of_Fortune object
